amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing the number of U.S. Customs and Border Protection officers at air ports of entry.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 588 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 588 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Schatz. (consideration: CR S1980; text: CR S1980) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing the number of U.S. Customs and Border Protection officers at air ports of entry.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 588 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Schatz.
